name: Dream Team Transfers
desc: Full-stack application which offers users a realistic simulation of Soccer Transfers using real-life data from Transfermarkt. Built using Python, React, and PouchDB.

name: Oven Ready Bakes
desc: Static web page for a baking startup. This site, built with React, provides a platform for customers to view baked items, contact bakers, and submit orders with linked Google APIs.

name: My Github Page
desc: Interactive portfolio website showcasing my work and technical experience. Revamped in 2024 from a Jekyll blog page to a dynamic React application for a more user-friendly interface.

name: Expense Management
desc: Full-stack application leveraging indexedDB for reliable user expense data storage. Designed for seamless CRUD operations that ensures scalability with a user-friednly UI/UX built in React.

name: Twitter Search Engine
desc: Full-stack application that uses a Lucene index built on Twitter Crawler data to create an efficienct search engine. Integrated into a Spring Boot and Node.js backend, with results embedded on an Angular front end.

name: Android Time Tracker
desc: Android App developed in Kotlin for employees to log hours. It uses a locally hosted SQLite database for  seamless storage management and incorporates Android APIs to enable a shake-to-start feature.

name: User Engagement Map
desc: Full-stack application that visualizes real-time user engagement for the client, and registration for the user. Built with React, NodeJS, MongoDB, and Google Cloud APIs.

name: Krazy Kitchen Game
desc: Full-stack application that uses a Lucene index built on Twitter Crawler data to create an efficienct search engine. Integrated into a Spring Boot and Node.js backend, with results embedded on an Angular front end.

name: AI/ML
desc: Full-stack application that uses a Lucene index built on Twitter Crawler data to create an efficienct search engine. Integrated into a Spring Boot and Node.js backend, with results embedded on an Angular front end.

name: Embedded Systems
desc: Full-stack application that uses a Lucene index built on Twitter Crawler data to create an efficienct search engine. Integrated into a Spring Boot and Node.js backend, with results embedded on an Angular front end.

name: Intern Audio
desc: Full-stack application that uses a Lucene index built on Twitter Crawler data to create an efficienct search engine. Integrated into a Spring Boot and Node.js backend, with results embedded on an Angular front end.

name: BoxBot Hackathon
desc: A Bluetooth-controlled RC car built using the Arduino IDE. This project won the Best Hardware Hack at the 2017 Citrus Hack and was built in a team of four engineers.
